DOC.detailed_description: A randomize controlled clinical trial carry university-affiliated tertiary center.Participating woman randomize two group : Group A give oral daily dose 0.6 g NAC effervescent form ; group B , serve control , receive NAC.The two group compare accord pregnancy outcome .
